Reviews.Title: Works like an iphone
Reviews.Author: ABU KOROMA
Reviews.Content: This phone operates similar things that an iphone or galaxy does. It downloads a variety of apps like facebook, skype, weather, whatsapp, viber, and so on. Most important, it works international. You just need to buy a sim card for a particular country and you can communicate with the rest of the world. The camera is superb, can video a whole two-hours event. It also has dual ports for two sims. Charging last long.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't suggest buying it
Reviews.Author: Danny Kring
Reviews.Content: it is a cheap phone I'm glad I only paid $50 no 3G no 4G no GPSit is a basic Android phone

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: medjai
Reviews.Content: The phone is really a piece of crap. If all you want to do is make phone calls then this phone will work for you. If you want to play games this is not the phone for you.

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tarishia Carter
Reviews.Content: This phone sucks it doesn't upload apps pics or music. Phone cuts off in middle of a call. Wish I could return this phone....

Reviews.Title: below expection
Reviews.Author: Locksley Seaton
Reviews.Content: this piece of garbage did not work for more than week, then the battery starts loosing its charge in a hour even though it comes with 2 battery, I am really so disapointed

Reviews.Title: NOT SATISFIED!!!
Reviews.Author: Remilou
Reviews.Content: The phone I received isn't even the phone I bought and the phone I got doesnt even work and when I asked to get a refund they told me that they want to send me a battery instead, which never came. Now I bought a new battery myself and the phone still doesn't work!!!! I would give them zero stars but that doesn't work I have to give them one star..

Reviews.Title: Does Not Work With StraightTalk
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Thought buying an unlocked phone would be enough but it was not. I have StraightTalk used it for over a year and like saving money from the high prices named brand options but StraightTalks compatible phone choices were lacking. This one looked promising looked and worked like a iPhone Clone, I love it for internet where it is fast and works great, my little one loves borrowing it for playing games on it that she says are faster than her computer. She likes the font and back camera too. But unless I can use it as a phone on StraightTalk, to me it is just a really small screen tablet. I wished I researched its comaptibility before I bought it. Thought I should let you know before anyone else makes my same mistake.

Reviews.Title: don't like this phone
Reviews.Author: kea35
Reviews.Content: can't access google and takes forever to down load apps and most apps won't work on this phone I have a simple mobile sim card never had any problems with any other android phone

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Jermaine wright
Reviews.Content: This phone is a good phone.  it didn't give me no problem plus the person i bought it for love it the only thing I don't like about this phone it don't come with a flashlight but every thing else work great on it

Reviews.Title: bad phone , ripe off by seller
Reviews.Author: barbara aboagye
Reviews.Content: very bad product ,is overheating ,it goes off by it self. The battery is always low. I wonder why amazon is allowing something like this to be sold on their website .all the feature are not what is supposed to be

Reviews.Title: I want to know more about this product
Reviews.Author: Rom
Reviews.Content: I want to know if this phone can download the pin and it lasts for as yet come to order this cell

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product
Reviews.Author: Aura B.
Reviews.Content: The phone is all we expected,  it works perfect, unlocked and there is not difference between this and the S3,  I recommend the product and I highlight recommend the Seller.

Reviews.Title: cn this phone b used for straightalk
Reviews.Author: key203
Reviews.Content: cn ii put this phone on straight talk? Cn some one inform me before I send it bk. Because  have verizon n they can not activate it because it isn't verzon

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: ALFONSO BERRIOS
Reviews.Content: I run the Primara week though the internet was slow. Then audio stopped working without being activate or deactivate a function of the equipment and only listening with headphones. It takes too long to load internet pages and not allowed to see images from the web. The bluetooth connection does not work for transferring files to another phone. Only wasap and text messaging works correctly.The truth would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Trash Phone 100%
Reviews.Author: Natasha
Reviews.Content: Please don't waste your money this is a junk phone seriously. I'm all about savings l this no no no no matter how cheap you are. It turns off freezes easy viruses from I don't know where. It's a generics of generic phone. Straight talk flip phones are better. 2 stars for sound and refund. Camera sucksss omg Bad! That's the truth good luck if u don't listen to me.

Reviews.Title: i comes from china and their government controls everything coming in and out of china
Reviews.Author: Daberechi O.
Reviews.Content: It arrived late but was more than I anticipated. There was a lot of inspection papers attached to the shipment

Reviews.Title: this phone
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: I haven't got the phone yet but the customer service is great love these guys they are the best period

Reviews.Title: Maxo Sage
Reviews.Author: Pierre R Beaubrun
Reviews.Content: This is great for the price.i thinking about buying five more phones to give to my family members. It is easy to use

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: darweisha williams
Reviews.Content: first it took for ever for it to come in the mail. then when I get it does not even work.

Reviews.Title: somewhat an ok product
Reviews.Author: gracia
Reviews.Content: This item is in good quality but it seems to be used due to the slight scrapings on the case and exterior parts of the phone.
